short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helping you buy the most limited items on YeezySupply and Adidas with the least amount of effort

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you need a tool that will help you stay on top of your game while waiting in the YeezySupply or Adidas queue, this is it. This extension will allow you to get real time notifications when your tabs get through the queue and will notify you with many different features so you never miss your opportunity. Make sure to join the Discord for extra guides!
